marklogic.body:
This whole story makes Trayvon sound guilty of something.
1. He had a history of breaking into houses and stealing jewelry.2. He was Acting suspicious and looking all around when Zimmerman Spotted him. 3. He responded with violence when asked what he was doing in the neighborhood.What we don't know is what was in Trayvon's pockets when Zimmerman Spotted him? Did he have jewelry in his pockets? We don't know, but the facts above suggest that he did. However, we will just have to wait for the police report to be released to know for certain how much jewelry Trayvon had in his pockets.
